${modID}:SatansGrudge.NAME: Satan's Grudge
${modID}:SatansGrudge.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL While in hand, lose 2 HP and gain as much ${modID}:Begrudged whenever a card is Exhausted.

${modID}:Clog.NAME: Clog
${modID}:Clog.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. Ethereal. NL While in hand, whenever a card is discarded, shuffle a *Clog into your draw pile.

${modID}:BadCode.NAME: Bad Code
${modID}:BadCode.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. Ethereal. NL When you draw this card, Channel 1 ${modID}:Brick.

${modID}:TheBigSad.NAME: The Big Sad
${modID}:TheBigSad.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, enter ${modID}:Depression and Exhaust. NL Whenever you enter Wrath, ${modID}:Exhume this card and shuffle it into your draw pile.

${modID}:CultistMicrophone.NAME: Cultist Microphone
${modID}:CultistMicrophone.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. Ethereal. NL When you draw this card, you feel talkative.

${modID}:DeadOff.NAME: Dead Off
${modID}:DeadOff.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, move all hermit:Dead_On cards to the left side of your hand.

${modID}:SplitCrap.NAME: Split: Crap
${modID}:SplitCrap.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. Ethereal. NL When you draw this card, slimeboundmod:Split into a ${modID}:Crap_Slime.

${modID}:BlackDiamond.NAME: Black Diamond
${modID}:BlackDiamond.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. guardianmod:Gem. NL When you draw this card, increase each of your debuffs by 1.

${modID}:FaultyGyroscope.NAME: Faulty Gyroscope
${modID}:FaultyGyroscope.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL While in hand, hexamod:Advance after you hexamod:Retract and hexamod:Retract after you hexamod:Advance.

${modID}:Misinput.NAME: Misinput
${modID}:Misinput.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, lose ALL your Vigor and champ:Counter.

${modID}:CoconutJPG.NAME: Coconut.jpg
${modID}:CoconutJPG.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, bronze:Encode it.

${modID}:LichsSoul.NAME: Lich's Soul
${modID}:LichsSoul.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, lose 1 collector:Reserve. NL This card cannot be Exhausted.

${modID}:BathroomBreak.NAME: Bathroom Break
${modID}:BathroomBreak.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. Ethereal. NL When you draw this card, your current Gremlin leaves the battle.

${modID}:Eyepatch.NAME: Eyepatch
${modID}:Eyepatch.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL While in hand, cards that are sneckomod:Muddled can't decrease in cost.
